meanings.definition: to withdraw from often in the face of danger or encroachment
to lower in rank, office, prestige, or esteem
meanings.synonyms: debauch, degrade, profane, vitiate, discredit, foul, smirch, take down
meanings.antonyms: elevate, ennoble, uplift, aggrandize, canonize, deify, exalt
meanings.example: He was unwilling to abase himself by pleading guilty to a crime that he did not commit
